title: news

title: introducing images!

content: we added profile pictures and description to your profile, have no pfp? then we use a default one

title: If we remove all bones from a human, do they become a water balloon?
Bad news about my soup
content: I microwaved my soup for 99 minutes instead of 99 seconds. What now?, If I eat it, do I explode like a nuke?

title: IP accounts are ending
content: we've decided to move to a new method using the IDs of the users
